headlines.description: Newcastle appeared set to snatch the points when Sean Morrison was adjudged to have handled in stoppage time.

video.headline: Etheridge saves the day for Cardiff in stoppage time

tracking.trackingName: Etheridge saves the day for Cardiff in stoppage time

headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle miss late penalty in Cardiff draw

headlines.description: Brazilian winger Richarlison continued his sparkling start to the season with his third goal in two games as Everton beat Southampton 2-1.

video.headline: Everton 2-1 Southampton: Toffees' new hero strikes again

tracking.trackingName: Everton 2-1 Southampton: Toffees' new hero strikes again

headlines.shortLinkText: Richarlison strikes again as Everton sink Saints

headlines.description: Leicester City had Jamie Vardy sent off, but that did not stop them from recording a comfortable 2-0 home win.

video.headline: Leicester 2-0 Wolves: Vardy sees red in Foxes win

tracking.trackingName: Leicester 2-0 Wolves: Vardy sees red in Foxes win

headlines.shortLinkText: Vardy sees red but Leicester ease to victory

headlines.description: Harry Kane finally ended his August goalscoring drought as England's World Cup luminaries inspired Tottenham Hotspur to a morale-boosting 3-1 win.

video.headline: Tottenham 3-1 Fulham: Kane breaks his August duck

tracking.trackingName: Tottenham 3-1 Fulham: Kane breaks his August duck

headlines.shortLinkText: Kane ends August goal drought as Spurs beat Fulham

events.name: AFC Bournemouth at West Ham United

video.headline: West Ham 1-2 Bournemouth: Wilson's solo goal sparks Cherries win

headlines.shortLinkText: Wilson stunner rallies Bournemouth at West Ham

headlines.description: Stamford Bridge thriller had seen Arsenal fight back from two goals down to level.
